definitions.example: Robinson Crusoe was a famous fictional castaway.
This old coat was a castaway in someone's trash.

definitions.definition: An outcast; someone cast out of a group or society.
definitions.example: These homeless people are society's castaways.
After the mutiny, the castaway ship's officers suffered a month at sea in the lifeboat.
The storm left them castaway on an uninhabited island.

definitions.definition: Cast out; rejected or excluded from a group.
